name: Higgeldy Piggeldy
description:
A short horror game for #bitesizedhorror jam. Wandering through an abandoned building is creepy enough without a nursery-rhyme singing psycho following you!

I thought I had a week longer than I did to finish, so the concept might have gone beyond what I could pull together. Enjoy it for what it is :-)

Written in vanilla Javascript. Tested in Chrome.
